name: Set base path
Set 404
Create http endpoint <nodered>/files/xxx  where xxx is the file name to download
Set Actual Values
F5
info:
Chequea cada conexión (cada vez que se refresca o se entra al dashboard), y genera un delay para parsear el archivo.
También está atento a si se actualizan los datos.

name: Head - Template
format:
<style>
    /*
    Pre-defined colors
    */
    :root {
        --color-link-text-dark: rgba(241, 153, 226, 1);
        --color-link-text-light: rgb(243, 44, 44, 1);
        --color-link-text: var(--color-link-text-light);
        
        --color-toolbar-text-dark: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);
        --color-toolbar-text-light: rgb(0, 0, 0, 1);
        --color-toolbar-text: var(--color-toolbar-text-light);
        
        --color-main-dark:  rgba(75, 121, 48, 1);
        --color-main-light:  rgba(250, 253, 144, 1);
        --color-main: var(--color-main-light);
        
        --color-text-light: rgba(104, 107, 0, 1);
        --color-text-dark: rgba(109, 176, 70, 1);
        --color-text: var(--color-text-light);
        
        --color-card-light: rgba(250, 250, 233, 1);
        --color-card-dark: rgba(51, 51, 51, 1);
        --color-card: var(--color-card-light);
        
        --color-widget-border: rgb(84, 78, 78);
        --color-widget-trans: rgba(178, 178, 178, 0.2);
        
        --color-button-light: rgba(188, 194, 54, 0.8);
        --color-button-dark: rgba(75, 121, 48, 0.8);
        --color-button: var(--color-button-light);
        
        --color-button-text-light: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
        --color-button-text-dark: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
        --color-button-text: var(--color-button-text-light);
        
        --color-button-background-light: rgba(155, 158, 24, 1);
        --color-button-background-dark: rgba(109, 176, 70, 1);
        --color-button-background: var(--color-button-background-light);
        
        --color-selection-light: rgba(100,100,155,1);
        --color-selection-dark: rgba(154,116,116,0.8);
        --color-selection: var(--color-selection-light);
        
        --color-tint-light: rgba(182, 182, 255,1);
        --color-tint-dark: rgba(255, 182, 182,1);
        --color-tint: var(--color-tint-light);
        
        --color-gauge-light: rgba(155, 158, 24, 1);/*(182, 187, 9, 0.8);*/
        --color-gauge-dark: rgba(165, 231, 138, 0.8);
        --color-gauge: var(--color-gauge-light);
        
        --color-background-primary-light: rgba(239, 243, 136, 1);/*rgba(250, 253, 144, 1);*/
        --color-background-secondary-light: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);
        
        --color-background-primary-dark: rgba(44, 73, 26, 0.5);
        --color-background-secondary-dark: rgba(82, 159, 35, 0.5);
        
        --color-background-primary: var(--color-background-primary-light);
        --color-background-secondary: var(--color-background-secondary-light);

        --color-toolbar-background-light: rgba(239, 243, 136, 0.7);
        --color-toolbar-background-dark: rgba(44, 73, 26, 0.7);
        --color-toolbar-background: var(--color-toolbar-background-light);

        --color-numeric-node-background-light: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);
        --color-numeric-node-background-dark: rgba(17, 17, 17, 1);
        --color-numeric-node-background: var(--color-numeric-node-background-light);

        --color-numeric-node-text-light: rgba(17, 17, 17, 1);
        --color-numeric-node-text-dark: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);
        --color-numeric-node-text: var(--color-numeric-node-text-light);
        
    }

    /*Numeric Nodes*/
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-numeric .value {
        background-color: var(--color-numeric-node-background);
        color: var(--color-numeric-node-text);
    }

    /*Left Toolbar*/
    .nr-menu-item-active div button {
        border-right-color: var(--color-text);
    }
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav {
        color: var(--color-text);
        background-color: var(--color-toolbar-background);
    }
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav div.md-list-item-inner {
        color: var(--color-text);
    }
    /*Toolbar gradient*/
    md-toolbar#toolbar{
        background: var(--color-main);
        /*linear-gradient(120deg, var(--color-main) 20%, var(--color-background-secondary) 100%);*/ 
    }
    /*Toolbar text*/
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar .md-toolbar-tools {
        color: var(--color-toolbar-text);
    }
    /*Group name*/
    .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
        color: var(--color-text);
    }
    /*Gauge number and units*/
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-gauge text {
        fill: var(--color-gauge);
        margin: 8px;
    }
    /*Background*/
    .masonry-container {
        position: relative;
        width: 100%;
        height:100%;
        margin: 0 auto;
        background: linear-gradient(180deg,  var(--color-background-primary) 0%, var(--color-background-secondary) 100%); 
    }
    /*Group color*/
    .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel {
        background-color: #333333FF;
        color:var(--color-text);
        border-radius: 10px;
        box-shadow: 0 0 8px 0px #00000080;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button  {
        background: var(--color-button-background);
        color:var(--color-button-text);
    }
    /*Widget color and text: necesito que el alpha sea 0 así se copia el color del card*/
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
        background-color: #00000000;
        color: var(--color-text);
    }
    /*Widget date text color*/
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-date-picker md-input-container .md-input {
        color: var(--color-text);
    }
    /*ol color: necesito que el alpha sea 0 así se copia el color del card*/
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-template {
        background-color: #33333300;
    }
    /*Card color*/
    .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel {
        background-color: var(--color-card);
        color: var(--color-text);
    }
    /*Date picker original date: necesito que el alpha sea 0*/
    .md-datepicker-calendar-pane.md-pane-open {
        background-color: #ffffff00;
    }
    /*Date picker header color*/
    .md-default-theme .md-calendar-day-header, .md-calendar-day-header {
        color: var(--color-text);
        background-color: var(--color-background-primary);
    }
    /*Date picker day color*/
    .md-default-theme .md-calendar-date.md-calendar-selected-date .md-calendar-date-selection-indicator, .md-calendar-date.md-calendar-selected-date .md-calendar-date-selection-indicator, .md-default-theme .md-calendar-date.md-focus.md-calendar-selected-date .md-calendar-date-selection-indicator, .md-calendar-date.md-focus.md-calendar-selected-date .md-calendar-date-selection-indicator {
        background: var(--color-background-primary);
        color: var(--color-text);
        border-color: transparent;
    }
    /*Date picker actual date border*/
    .md-default-theme .md-calendar-date.md-calendar-date-today .md-calendar-date-selection-indicator, .md-calendar-date.md-calendar-date-today .md-calendar-date-selection-indicator {
        border: 1px solid var(--color-background-primary);
    }
    /*Date picker icon*/
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-date-picker .md-button.md-icon-button md-icon {
        color: var(--color-text);
    }
    /*Date picker underline*/
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-input-container.md-default-theme .md-input, md-input-container .md-input {
        border-color: var(--color-text) !important;
    }
    
    /*Button*/
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
        background: var(--color-button);
        color: var(--color-button-text);
    }
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
        background-color: var(--color-button);
        color: white;
    }
    /*Button shadow*/
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button:hover {
        background-color: var(--color-button-background);
    }
    a:link{
        color: var(--color-link-text);
    }
</style>

<script id="headScript" type="text/javascript">
    /*
    Javascript to inject UI elements into the top of all dashboards (head)
    */
    var clockInterval;
    $(function () {
        if (clockInterval) return;

        //add logo
        var div0 = $('<div/>');
        var logo = new Image();
        logo.src = "data:image/gif;base64,"
        logo.height = 45;

        div0[0].style.margin = '10px auto';
        div0[0].style.width = '100px';
        div0[0].style.float = 'left';

        div0.append(logo);
        
        
        //add clock
        var div1 = $('<div/>');
        var p = $('<p/>');

        div1.append(p);
        div1[0].style.margin = '5px';
        div1[0].style.width = '120px';
        div1[0].style.float = 'right';

        function displayTime() {
            p.text(new Date().toLocaleTimeString());
        }
        
        //add day/night mode button
        var div2 = $('<div/>');
        var button = document.createElement('BUTTON');
        var html = document.getElementsByTagName('html')[0];
        var elem = window.getComputedStyle(html);
        var night_icon = document.createElement("night");
        var day_icon = document.createElement("day");
        day_icon.className ="fa fa-moon-o";
        night_icon.className ="fa fa-sun-o";
        button.appendChild(night_icon);
        button.onclick = function(){
            button.replaceChild((button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? day_icon : night_icon, (button.firstChild.nodeName == "DAY") ? day_icon : night_icon);
            html.style.setProperty("--color-main",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-main-light") : elem.getPropertyValue("--color-main-dark"));
            html.style.setProperty("--color-text",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-text-light") : elem.getPropertyValue("--color-text-dark"));
            html.style.setProperty("--color-button",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-button-light") : elem.getPropertyValue("--color-button-dark"));
            html.style.setProperty("--color-gauge",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-gauge-light") : elem.getPropertyValue("--color-gauge-dark"));
            html.style.setProperty("--color-selection",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-selection-light") : elem.getPropertyValue("--color-selection-dark"));
            html.style.setProperty("--color-tint",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-tint-light") : elem.getPropertyValue("--color-tint-dark"));
            html.style.setProperty("--color-background-primary",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-background-primary-light") : elem.getPropertyValue("--color-background-primary-dark"));
            html.style.setProperty("--color-background-secondary",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-background-secondary-light") :elem.getPropertyValue("--color-background-secondary-dark"));
            html.style.setProperty("--color-card",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-card-light") :elem.getPropertyValue("--color-card-dark"));
            html.style.setProperty("--color-button-background",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-button-background-light") :elem.getPropertyValue("--color-button-background-dark"));
            html.style.setProperty("--color-button-text",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-button-text-light") :elem.getPropertyValue("--color-button-text-dark"));
            html.style.setProperty("--color-toolbar-text",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-toolbar-text-light") :elem.getPropertyValue("--color-toolbar-text-dark"));
            
            html.style.setProperty("--color-link-text",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-link-text-light") :elem.getPropertyValue("--color-link-text-dark"));

            html.style.setProperty("--color-toolbar-background",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ?
            elem.getPropertyValue("--color-toolbar-background-light") :elem.getPropertyValue("--color-toolbar-background-dark"));

            html.style.setProperty("--color-numeric-node-background",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-numeric-node-background-light") :elem.getPropertyValue("--color-numeric-node-background-dark"));

            html.style.setProperty("--color-numeric-node-text",(button.firstChild.nodeName == "NIGHT") ? elem.getPropertyValue("--color-numeric-node-text-light") :elem.getPropertyValue("--color-numeric-node-text-dark"));
        }

        div2[0].style.margin = '5px auto';
        div2[0].style.width = '60px';
        div2[0].style.float = 'right';
        button.tooltip = 'Cambia entre los temas oscuro (dark) y claro (light).';
        button.style.color = elem.getPropertyValue("--color-widget");
        button.style.background = elem.getPropertyValue("--color-widget-trans");
        button.style.borderRadius = '20%';
        div2.append(button);
        
        clockInterval = setInterval(displayTime, 1000);

        //add to toolbar when it's available
        var addToToolbarTimer;
        
        function addToToolbar() {
            var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
            
            if(!toolbar.length) return;
            
            toolbar.append(div0);
            toolbar.append(div1);
            toolbar.append(div2);
            clearInterval(addToToolbarTimer);
        }
        addToToolbarTimer = setInterval(addToToolbar, 100);
    });
</script>

name: Generate Lum Update
Generate TyH Update
Download Ave
format:
<script>
(function(scope) {
  scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
    if (msg.payload.code == 0) {
        window.location.href = "/files/Datos_Ave.zip";
    }
    return msg;
  });
})(scope);
</script>

name: Delete Lum
format:
<script>
(function(scope) {
  scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
    if (msg) {
        let menu_lum = document.getElementById('Lum_list');
        while (menu_lum.firstChild) {
            menu_lum.removeChild(menu_lum.firstChild);
        }
    }
    
  });
})(scope);
</script>

name: Delete TyH
format:
<script>
(function(scope) {
  scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
    if (msg) {
        let menu_tyh = document.getElementById('tyh_list');
        while (menu_tyh.firstChild) {
            menu_tyh.removeChild(menu_tyh.firstChild);
        }
    }
    
  });
})(scope);
</script>

name: Connect

CSV Parser
info: CSV Lister toma todos los *.csv. Lum filter y TyH filter seleccionan las mediciones de cada varialbe para que los ui_templates los coloquen en su adecuado lugar.

name: ui_temlplate - Lum
ui_temlplate - TyH
Filter Lum CSV
Filter TyH CSV
Delete
format:
<script>
(function(scope) {
  scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
    if (msg) {
      if (flow.get('lum_valid_date') || 0) {
        let menu_lum = document.getElementById('Lum_list');
        while (menu_lum.firstChild) {
          menu_lum.removeChild(menu_lum.firstChild);
        }
      }
  
      if (flow.get('tyh_valid_date') || 0) {
        let menu_tyh = document.getElementById('tyh_list');
        while (menu_tyh.firstChild) {
          menu_tyh.removeChild(menu_tyh.firstChild);
        }
      }
  
      if (flow.get('png_valid_date') || 0) {
        let menu_png = document.getElementById('png_list');
        while (menu_png.firstChild) {
          menu_png.removeChild(menu_png.firstChild);
        }
      }
    }    
  });
})(scope);
</script>
